strapiPost.title: A New Co-Working Space In Rogers
strapiPost.content:
There’s a new, unique shared workspace in Rogers called The CoFounder, making it the first of its kind in the Rogers area. 

  • The office: It recently opened in Founders Plaza, which is a five story, 117,000 sq/ft building in Pinnacle Hills. It’s a Class A office building in which The CoFounder has nearly 9,000 sq/ft of co-working space. 
  • Space of the future: The CoFounder has 17 private offices, a kitchen, conference rooms, plenty of couches and booths, and an outdoor space for food trucks. Some believe co-working spaces are the future of offices, promoting flexibility, diverse interaction, and a more autonomous work life. 

For more information, click HERE.
